trans-unit.source: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.

trans-unit.source: "Wirewood cannot hide great size. Only with speed and skill can we survive here."
trans-unit.target: "Wirewood cannot hide great size. Only with speed and skill can we survive here."

trans-unit.source: Elvish Champion
trans-unit.target: Elvish Champion

trans-unit.source: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
trans-unit.target: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

trans-unit.source: "For what are leaves but countless blades\nTo fight a countless foe on high."\n—Elvish hymn
trans-unit.target: "For what are leaves but countless blades\nTo fight a countless foe on high."\n—Elvish hymn

trans-unit.source: Elvish Eulogist
trans-unit.target: Elvish Eulogist

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."
trans-unit.target: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

trans-unit.source: Elvish Promenade

trans-unit.source: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.
trans-unit.target: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.

trans-unit.source: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.
trans-unit.target: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

trans-unit.source: Elvish Visionary
trans-unit.target: Elvish Visionary

trans-unit.source: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.
trans-unit.target: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

trans-unit.source: Elvish Warrior
trans-unit.target: Elvish Warrior

trans-unit.source: As graceful as a deer leaping a stream and as deadly as the wolf waiting in ambush on the other side, elvish warriors are the eyes of the forest as well as its unsheathed claws.
trans-unit.target: As graceful as a deer leaping a stream and as deadly as the wolf waiting in ambush on the other side, elvish warriors are the eyes of the forest as well as its unsheathed claws.

trans-unit.source: Creature spells can't be countered.

trans-unit.source: "Gaea sings with the voice of nature rampant: a thousand howls, chitters, and cries, and none of them can be ignored."
